item.title: 3DGraphLLM: Combining Semantic Graphs and Large Language Models for 3D Scene Understanding
item.description: 3DGraphLLM boosts 3D scene understanding by cleverly merging semantic graphs and LLMs, enabling more accurate scene descriptions and outperforming existing methods.
